title: AADE: Six new digital “weapons” against tax evasion in 2026
description: Target: 72,800 audits and additional revenues of €2.5 billion with Artificial Intelligence, real-time monitoring, and preventive risk analysis
content: In 2026, the Independent Authority for Public Revenue (AADE) is moving forward with the completion and further upgrading of the digital audits it applies. That year, six new digital “weapons” will be activated to combat tax evasion, including the int... [9169 chars]

title: The horrific 'nude' AI pictures being posted online without consent
description: An artificial intelligence chatbot within X has been used in recent days to create sexualised and nude images of adults and children without consent. Urgent calls have now been made for action to be taken against the 'abusive' tool on the popular platform. James Holt reports.
content: An artificial intelligence chatbot within X has been used in recent days to create sexualised and nude images of adults and children without consent. Urgent calls have now been made for action to be taken against the 'abusive' tool on the popular pla... [14613 chars]

title: MCMC blocks Grok AI chatbot over sexually explicit content
description: PETALING JAYA: The Grok Artificial Intelligence (AI) chatbot has been temporarily blocked in Malaysia effective Jan 11.
content:
PETALING JAYA: The Grok Artificial Intelligence (AI) chatbot has been temporarily blocked in Malaysia effective Jan 11.
The Malaysian Communications and Multimedia Commission (MCMC) said this was due to repeated misuse of the AI chatbot to generate o... [1430 chars]

title: Microsoft AI chief questions how safe current AI really is

title: AI toymakers urge caution at CES after chatbot teddy bear sparks alarm
description: Toymakers at CES urged caution over AI-powered toys after a watchdog report found chatbot teddy bears giving sexual and violent advice, raising concerns over child safety, privacy, data sharing and the risks of unchecked generative artificial intelligence in playrooms.
content: Amid the Grok controversy, and sudden glitches in the artificial intelligence sector, toy makers at the Consumer Electronics Show were adamant about being careful to ensure that their fun creations infused with generative artificial intelligence don’... [2154 chars]

title: Motley Fool: Microsoft for the long term
description: Microsoft (Nasdaq: MSFT) is a ubiquitous brand in computing, and that works to its advantage in the age of artificial intelligence. Hundreds of millions of people use Microsoft Office and Windows-based software products, providing a large installed base of users to help pay back its AI investments.

title: AI toys look for bright side after troubled start
description: Toy makers at the Consumer Electronics Show were adamant about being careful to ensure that their fun creations infused with generative artificial intelligence don't turn naughty. Toy giant Mattel, meanwhile, made no mention of the report in mid-December when it postponed the release of its first toy developed in partnership with ChatGPT-maker OpenAI.
